page.title: 05A FAMILY WEEKEND
page.content: I woke up at half seven on a Saturday and I sneaked downstairs and into the kitchen.There was the sun streaming through the side window.It made me feel hungry.So I had my breakfast.After that I went into the diningroom and tormented Bobbie our budgie.I went into the livingroom.To my horror the clock said 8!Icrept up to my Dads bedroom.I took a run up and jumped over my dad."Couldn't you do that softer?"Dad said sleepily."Don't forget Sarah's going on a ramble up to Halls Place at Bexley"said mum from inside the bathroom.Dad told me to wake Sarah up.Soon we were heading for Elmstead Lane Baptist Church.When we got there Sarah went to her friends and dad had a chat with the leader.She asked my dad if he could drive a few girls up to Halls Place.
